contexts.context: "I would say, <mark>Funcrazot</mark> Priif," said Yakin. "They say he is the greatest...
...with advanced agility sees. In time, Oin came upon <mark>Funcrazot</mark> in a field outside the city, dOing his regular exercises...
"Ah, behold the power of the amazing <mark>Funcrazot</mark> Priif," said the afore-mentioned, and prompted his...
...blows with his shield, he revealed that he had pickpocketed <mark>Funcrazot</mark> Priif's purse.
